name: 12NewsOnYourSide
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from 12 News On Your Side Richmond, Virgina within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Richmond, Virgina area from the 12 News On Your Side Weather team.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
